arabic.title: فرحتنا
text: يا حياتى ياما حلمنا باليوم ده
بيت واحد وحب فى قلبونا كبير
اليوم ده يوم اجمل من الاحلام
مش عايزه حاجه تانيه بعدك خلاص
اليوم ده يوم اجمل من الاحلام

english.title: Our Happiness
text: Oh my life I've always dreamed of this day
And we're so patient my lifetime
And finally one house and love In our big heart
And my heart Is at rest coz you're with me
And my years will be better
Coz baby I'll live them with you
Our happiness Is shown in our eyes
And why we'll hide those who feel me
Today Is more beautiful than dreams
And how can I Just find the  words
That can express how It feels
We'll live and start a new life
And I'll never be alone again
And It forgets about other people
I don't want anything else after you
Our happiness Is shown in our eyes
And why we'll hide those who feel me
Today Is more beautiful than dreams
And how can I Just find the  words
That can express how It feels
